speech.line: I pulled the laces out of the boot.
They're military boots.
It's a military canteen.
It's mostly empty.
Hmm..
There's a small key here.
I filled the canteen with whiskey.
Ominous.
It's a rifle.
A small key emerged from the barrel.
I draped the rosary on the rifle.
It's.. a poem about, soldiers?
I don't recognize any of the names in this..
It's a locked chest.
It looks like some sort of compass.
There's something between the floorboards here.
I can't reach it with my fingers.
That might work, but it's too far down.
I've tied the laces to the floor.
There's something between the floorboards here.
There was a key below the floorboards.
There was a key below the floorboards.
It's a triangular piece of metal.
It's a small metal key.
Someone's folded a dress shirt here.
Hmm..
I placed the pin on the shirt.
Looks like an empty case.
Might fit a bracelet, or a watch.
Hmm.. no blood this time.
The watch fits here.
It's a small metal key.
I put the watch in its case.
The faucet handles don't seem to turn.
I think they're rusty.
They look like rosary beads, but they're stuck in the drain.
Maybe I can get the sink to back up and push them out.
I think the cross is caught.
The water pushed it out.
It's a cabinet with a star pattern on the front.
It won't open.
Looks like a bottle of.. really cheap whiskey.
It looks like some sort of map.
This key doesn't fit here.. it's labeled with a '5'.
Looks like this side can be unlocked.
It says, 'Follow William'.
It looks like a writing desk.
It's locked.
It won't open.
It's locked.
Five dots are drawn on this pad.
It's a brass pin in a locked case.
The case is locked.
It's a triangular piece of metal.
Mailbox number one.
Mailbox number two.
Mailbox number three.
Mailbox number four.
Mailbox number five.
Looks like there's a magnet stuck to the inside.
Mailbox number six.
The clock casing is locked.
It looks like a watch inside.
An old watch.
It's a simple picture of soldiers.
They're facing different directions.
Got it.
Oops.

lines.name: AvatarHelp
lines.line: How can I help you?

branch.name: Objective
branch.text: What am I supposed to be doing again?

lines.name: Objective1
lines.line: I'm not sure what I'm supposed to be doing.

lines.name: Objective2
lines.line: This simulation is designed to ease you back into your memories.

lines.name: Objective3
lines.line: I suggest looking for some documentation, or a photograph.

branch.name: Direct
branch.text: Could you be more direct about what I can do?

lines.name: Direct1
lines.line: Could you be more direct about what I should be doing?

lines.name: Direct2
lines.line: It will be most beneficial to your recovering mind to discover your identity on your own.

lines.name: Direct3
lines.line: However, I can provide guidance in a limited capacity.

branch.name: OrderHint
branch.text: I'm still not sure where I should start.

lines.name: OrderHint1
lines.line: I'm still not sure where to begin.

lines.name: OrderHint2
lines.line: Look around everywhere, see if anything jogs your memory.

lines.name: OrderHint3
lines.line: The passage on the wall above the locked chest might be a good place to begin.

branch.name: ChestHint
branch.text: How can I open this chest?

lines.name: ChestHint1
lines.line: How can I open the chest?

lines.name: ChestHint2
lines.line: The key is close by, but requires some effort to retrieve.

lines.name: ChestHint3
lines.line: Have you found the mailbox key to the left of the door?

branch.name: LacesHint
branch.text: I can't reach under the floorboards.

lines.name: LacesHint1
lines.line: I can't reach under the floorboards.

lines.name: LacesHint2
lines.line: Look for something in the room that might extend your reach.

lines.name: LacesHint3
lines.line: Your collected objects can be accessed at the lower-left of your interface.

branch.name: DeskHint
branch.text: How do I open this desk?

lines.name: DeskHint1
lines.line: I don't know how to open the writing desk.

lines.name: DeskHint2
lines.line: You should see depictions of the symbols you need drawn on the letters scattered around the room.

lines.name: DeskHint3
lines.line: The order is important as well.

branch.name: DeskHint2
branch.text: I still need help with the desk.

lines.name: DeskHint21
lines.line: I'm still not sure how to get the desk open..

lines.name: DeskHint22
lines.line: The symbols are on each of four letters in the room. The order can be taken from the poem on the wall, above the chest.

lines.name: DeskHint23
lines.line: The first symbol looks a little like a harp.

branch.name: CabinetHint
branch.text: How can I open the cabinet with the star pattern?

lines.name: CabinetHint1
lines.line: The wooden cabinet won't open.

lines.name: CabinetHint2
lines.line: You'll need to complete the pattern.

lines.name: CabinetHint3
lines.line: Look around the room. Some pieces may not yet be available.

lines.name: CabinetHint4
lines.line: You should be able to find all the pieces now.

branch.name: ClockHint
branch.text: How can I open the grandfather clock?

lines.name: ClockHint1
lines.line: What should I do with this clock?

lines.name: ClockHint2
lines.line: There's a hint in the corner of the clock face.

lines.name: ClockHint3
lines.line: Look around the room. Some pieces may not yet be available.

lines.name: ClockHint4
lines.line: See if you can find objects that correspond with both symbols.

branch.name: PipesHint
branch.text: What can I do with the pipes under the sink?

lines.name: PipesHint1
lines.line: What can I do with these pipes under the sink?

lines.name: PipesHint2
lines.line: You'll need to combine two pieces of information to get the right settings.

lines.name: PipesHint3
lines.line: Focus on other questions for the time being.

lines.name: PipesHint4
lines.line: Look at the compass in the chest, and the pad in the desk.

branch.name: PincaseHint
branch.text: How can I open the wooden case in the desk?

lines.name: PincaseHint1
lines.line: How can I open the locked case in the desk?

lines.name: PincaseHint2
lines.line: You need to press the buttons in the right order.

lines.name: PincaseHint3
lines.line: Look for something in the room that depicts a sequence of directions.

branch.name: PlaceHint
branch.text: I've got something I don't know what to do with.

lines.name: PlaceHint1
lines.line: I'm not sure what to do with something I'm holding.

lines.name: PlaceHint2
lines.line: Make sure you read the letters in the room thoroughly.

lines.name: PlaceHint3
lines.line: You need to understand your past to recover your future.

lines.name: DeskHint31
lines.line: I understand what happened, but I'm not sure what to do next.

lines.name: DeskHint32
lines.line: Each of the four letters in the mailboxes have a symbol drawn on them.

lines.name: DeskHint33
lines.line: Last time, you entered these symbols in the order these four went into service. Now, enter them in the order they left.

lines.name: FollowHint1
lines.line: What does 'Follow William' mean?

lines.name: FollowHint2
lines.line: William may help you find the order to travel in the map before you.

lines.name: FollowHint3
lines.line: Check William's letters again.

lines.name: NeverMind1
lines.line: Never mind.

branch.name: SimulationAsk
branch.text: Why am I in this room?

lines.name: Simulation1
lines.line: Why am I in this particular room?

lines.name: Simulation2
lines.line: This environment has been seeded from your individual memories and grown into a healing experience.

lines.name: Simulation3
lines.line: As your subconscious is partly responsible, the details here may not be literal memory, but extrapolations from your impressions of a time in your life.

lines.name: Simulation4
lines.line: Exerting cognition on these issues is negatively correlated with recovery.

branch.name: Puzzles
branch.text: What's the point of all these puzzles?

lines.name: Puzzles1
lines.line: Why am I running around solving puzzles?

lines.name: Puzzles2
lines.line: As indicated, your cognition is in danger of fragmentation due to external events.

lines.name: Puzzles3
lines.line: Do not be alarmed. Completing these simulated tasks should return you to your baseline mental health.

lines.name: Puzzles4
lines.line: ..baseline mental health?

lines.name: Puzzles5
lines.line: DG Industries does not accept liability for results, as MELIORIS is classified as an experimental treatment attempted only when subjects lack capacity to consent.

lines.name: Puzzles5
lines.line: Exerting cognition on these issues is negatively correlated with recovery.

lines.name: Nathan1
lines.line: Am I.. Nathan?

lines.name: Nathan2
lines.line: That conclusion is yours alone to determine.

lines.name: Nathan3
lines.line: It looks like he's the only one who survived..

lines.name: Nathan4
lines.line: It is safe to confirm that Nathan Cliff was the lone survivor of the four depicted in this simulation.

lines.name: NeverMind
lines.line: Never mind.

lines.name: DoorDiscuss1
lines.line: Why is the door locked?

lines.name: DoorDiscuss2
lines.line: This simulation does not currently extend beyond this room.

lines.name: DoorDiscuss3
lines.line: Should we need more information to restore your memories, we can extend the simulation.

lines.name: DoorDiscuss4
lines.line: Focus on the task at hand.
